text.text: SHANGHAI BOASTS THE BUSTEST SHOPPING STREETSIN CHINA.
上海有中国最繁忙的购物街。
A:Have you ever been to Shanghai before?
B:No，but I’ve been to other big cities in China.
没有，但我去过中国其他的大城市。
A:So. this is your first time here.How do you likeShanghai?
这么说,这是你第一次来这里。你觉得上海怎么样?
B:I like it very much. Shanghai boasts thebusiest shopping streets in China.
我很喜欢上海。上海有中国最繁忙的购物街。
